text: Jack Frasure Hyles (September 25, 1926 in Texas - February 6, 2001 in Indiana) was a important person in the independent Baptist movement. He was the pastor of the First Baptist Church of Hammond in Hammond, Indiana from 1959 until his death in 2001. == Other websites == *The Jack Hyles Home Page -- books, sermons, & links *Hyles Publications -- a publisher of books and bibles including many by Jack Hyles *JackHyles.net -- An unofficial Jack Hyles site with archival copies of books and sermons *Biblical Discernment Ministeries -- criticism of Hyles Category:1926 births Category:2001 deaths Category:American Baptist ministers Category:People from Indiana Category:People from Texas
title: Jack Hyles
